entry.title: Build a Paypal Sandbox for Load Testing in 5 Minutes

link.title: Build a Paypal Sandbox for Load Testing in 5 Minutes

entry.content:
Paypal’s own sandbox explicitly disallows load testing, which presents a problem for performance engineers, namely that this makes it impossible to adequately test the one part of the checkout that actually makes the company money.

A solution to this is to mock the Paypal API using a tool that can support the traffic generated by a load test.
